attributes.action: Vote of "No Confidence" in David Cameron and his cabinet
attributes.additional_details:
I wish to petition the House for a vote of "No Confidence" in David Cameron as Prime minister or any of his governmental party.
He and his party have done little good in helping this country from getting off our knees. I feel that all the while Mr Cameron continues to push England to breaking point no good can be come to England or it's people, from his continued presence in Parliament and as it's leader.

rejection.details: Votes of no confidence are a matter for Parliament not the Government.
